thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful experience
thread.title_full: Wonderful experience - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ClausHansen
title: Wonderful experience
text:
Stayed here for 4 nights during our winter break. Hotel is located centrally in a nice little hutong very close to a metrostation and 20 min walking distance to the forbidden city and main Street.
Very nice staff who all speak English. Super high quality restaurant with good selection of dishes from different Chinese regions and some western food as well (didn't try).
Try the tea ceremony - that's great too. Relaxing oasis in the hectic Beijing.
100% recommended.
